displayProperties.name: Legendary Engram

displayProperties.description: Rahool can decrypt Exotic engrams with extreme precision.
displayProperties.name: Focused Decoding

displayProperties.description:
Focus or decrypt engrams with Rahool to earn progress towards New Stamps.

 Focusing Iron Banner, Trials, or Arcite's Keepsakes gear will also grant progress towards New Stamps.

 Each stamp will grant you Upgrade Materials.

 Completing the stamp card once will grant you access to the Engram Ensiders Club, allowing you to focus brand new Exotic armor.
displayProperties.name: Terms and Conditions

displayProperties.description:
Earn Ghost reputation by completing Pathfinder objectives, Overthrow, Lost Sectors, and Cysts, and by opening chests in the Pale Heart.

 Use Pale Heart Engrams with Ghost in the Pale Heart to receive specific Pale Heart gear and weapons.
displayProperties.name: GHOST REPUTATION
